snippet: A selection of the math problems at the MoMath Masters Tournament hosted by the New York Times puzzlemaster Will Shortz, at the first gala fund-raiser for the Museum of Mathematics, which will open in Manhattan this fall.
abstract: A selection of the math problems at the MoMath Masters Tournament hosted by the New York Times puzzlemaster Will Shortz, at the first gala fund-raiser for the Museum of Mathematics, which will open in Manhattan this fall.

headline.main: Numberplay: Math as a Spectator Sport
